  Manages Kibana dashboards https://www.elastic.co/docs/api/doc/kibana. This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release.

# elasticstack_kibana_dashboard (Resource)

Manages Kibana [dashboards](https://www.elastic.co/docs/api/doc/kibana). This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "elasticstack_kibana_dashboard" "my_dashboard" {
  title       = "My Dashboard"
  description = "A dashboard showing key metrics"

  # Time range
  time_from = "now-15m"
  time_to   = "now"

  # Refresh settings
  refresh_interval_pause = false
  refresh_interval_value = 60000 # 60 seconds

  # Query settings with text-based query (KQL or Lucene)
  query_language = "kuery"
  query_text     = "status:success"

  # Optional tags
  tags = ["production", "monitoring"]
}

# Example with JSON query (mutually exclusive with query_text)
resource "elasticstack_kibana_dashboard" "my_dashboard_json" {
  title       = "My Dashboard with JSON Query"
  description = "A dashboard with a structured query"

  # Time range
  time_from = "now-15m"
  time_to   = "now"

  # Refresh settings
  refresh_interval_pause = false
  refresh_interval_value = 60000 # 60 seconds

  # Query settings with JSON query object
  query_language = "kuery"
  query_json = jsonencode({
    bool = {
      must = [
        {
          match = {
            status = "success"
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  })

  # Optional tags
  tags = ["production", "monitoring"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `query_language` (String) The query language (e.g., 'kuery', 'lucene').
- `refresh_interval_pause` (Boolean) Set to false to auto-refresh data on an interval.
- `refresh_interval_value` (Number) A numeric value indicating refresh frequency in milliseconds.
- `time_from` (String) The start time for the dashboard's time range (e.g., 'now-15m', '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z').
- `time_to` (String) The end time for the dashboard's time range (e.g., 'now', '2023-12-31T23:59:59Z').
- `title` (String) A human-readable title for the dashboard.

### Optional

- `access_control` (Attributes) Access control parameters for the dashboard. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--access_control))
- `dashboard_id` (String) A unique identifier for the dashboard. If not provided, one will be generated.
- `description` (String) A short description of the dashboard.
- `options` (Attributes) Display options for the dashboard. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--options))
- `panels` (Attributes List) The panels to display in the dashboard. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels))
- `query_json` (String) The query as a JSON object for structured queries. Mutually exclusive with `query_text`.
- `query_text` (String) The query text for text-based queries such as Kibana Query Language (KQL) or Lucene query language. Mutually exclusive with `query_json`.
- `sections` (Attributes List) Sections organize panels into collapsible groups. This is a technical preview feature. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections))
- `space_id` (String) An identifier for the space. If space_id is not provided, the default space is used.
- `tags` (List of String) An array of tag IDs applied to this dashboard.
- `time_range_mode` (String) The time range mode. Valid values are 'absolute' or 'relative'.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Generated composite identifier for the dashboard.

<a id="nestedatt--access_control"></a>
### Nested Schema for `access_control`

Optional:

- `access_mode` (String) The access mode for the dashboard (e.g., 'write_restricted', 'default').
- `owner` (String) The owner of the dashboard.


<a id="nestedatt--options"></a>
### Nested Schema for `options`

Optional:

- `hide_panel_titles` (Boolean) Hide the panel titles in the dashboard.
- `sync_colors` (Boolean) Synchronize colors between related panels in the dashboard.
- `sync_cursor` (Boolean) Synchronize cursor position between related panels in the dashboard.
- `sync_tooltips` (Boolean) Synchronize tooltips between related panels in the dashboard.
- `use_margins` (Boolean) Show margins between panels in the dashboard layout.


<a id="nestedatt--panels"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels`

Required:

- `grid` (Attributes) The grid coordinates and dimensions of the panel. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--grid))
- `type` (String) The type of the panel (e.g. 'DASHBOARD_MARKDOWN', 'lens').

Optional:

- `config_json` (String) The configuration of the panel as a JSON string. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `xy_chart_config`, `metric_chart_config`, `datatable_config`, and `tagcloud_config`.
- `datatable_config` (Attributes) Configuration for a datatable chart panel. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `xy_chart_config`, `tagcloud_config`, and `config_json`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config))
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the panel.
- `markdown_config` (Attributes) The configuration of a markdown panel. Mutually exclusive with `config_json`, `xy_chart_config`, `datatable_config`, `metric_chart_config`, and `tagcloud_config`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--markdown_config))
- `metric_chart_config` (Attributes) Configuration for a metric chart panel. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `xy_chart_config`, `tagcloud_config`, `datatable_config`, and `config_json`. Metric charts display key performance indicators. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--metric_chart_config))
- `tagcloud_config` (Attributes) Configuration for a tagcloud chart panel. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `xy_chart_config`, `metric_chart_config`, `datatable_config`, and `config_json`. Tag clouds visualize word frequency. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--tagcloud_config))
- `xy_chart_config` (Attributes) Configuration for an XY chart panel. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `datatable_config`, `tagcloud_config`, and `config_json`. Use this for line, area, and bar charts. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config))

<a id="nestedatt--panels--grid"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.grid`

Required:

- `x` (Number) The X coordinate.
- `y` (Number) The Y coordinate.

Optional:

- `h` (Number) The height.
- `w` (Number) The width.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--datatable_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.datatable_config`

Optional:

- `esql` (Attributes) Datatable configuration for ES|QL queries. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql))
- `no_esql` (Attributes) Datatable configuration for standard (non-ES|QL) queries. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--no_esql))

<a id="nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.datatable_config.esql`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For ES|QL, this specifies the ES|QL query.
- `density` (Attributes) Density configuration for the datatable. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--density))
- `metrics` (Attributes List) Array of metric configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a datatable metric column. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--metrics))

Optional:

- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the datatable data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--filters))
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this datatable.
- `paging` (Number) Enables pagination and sets the number of rows to display per page.
- `rows` (Attributes List) Array of row configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a row split operation. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--rows))
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `sort_by` (String) Sort configuration as JSON. Only one column can be sorted at a time.
- `split_metrics_by` (Attributes List) Array of split-metrics configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a split operation for metric columns. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--split_metrics_by))
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--density"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.datatable_config.esql.density`

Optional:

- `height` (Attributes) Header and value height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height))
- `mode` (String) Density mode. Valid values: 'compact', 'default', 'expanded'.

<a id="nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.datatable_config.esql.density.height`

Optional:

- `header` (Attributes) Header height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height--header))
- `value` (Attributes) Value height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height--value))

<a id="nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height--header"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.datatable_config.esql.density.height.header`

Optional:

- `max_lines` (Number) Maximum number of lines to use before header is truncated (for custom header height).
- `type` (String) Header height type. Valid values: 'auto', 'custom'.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height--value"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.datatable_config.esql.density.height.value`

Optional:

- `lines` (Number) Number of lines to display per table body cell (for custom value height).
- `type` (String) Value height type. Valid values: 'auto', 'custom'.




<a id="nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--metrics"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.datatable_config.esql.metrics`

Required:

- `config` (String) Metric configuration as JSON.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--esql--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.datatable_config.esql.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.

- `metrics` (Attributes List) Array of metric configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a datatable metric column. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--metrics))
- `query` (Attributes) Query configuration for filtering data. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--query))

Optional:

- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the datatable data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--filters))
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this datatable.
- `paging` (Number) Enables pagination and sets the number of rows to display per page.
- `rows` (Attributes List) Array of row configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a row split operation. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--rows))
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.

- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--panels--markdown_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.markdown_config`

Optional:

- `content` (String) The content of the panel.
- `description` (String) The description of the panel.
- `hide_title` (Boolean) Hide the title of the panel.
- `title` (String) The title of the panel.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--metric_chart_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.metric_chart_config`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. Can be a data view dataset (`type: 'dataview'`), index dataset (`type: 'index'`), ES|QL dataset (`type: 'esql'`), or table ES|QL dataset (`type: 'tableESQLDatasetType'`).
- `metrics` (Attributes List) Array of metrics to display (1-2 items). Each metric can be a primary metric (displays prominently) or secondary metric (displays as comparison). Metrics can use field operations (count, unique count, min, max, avg, median, std dev, sum, last value, percentile, percentile ranks), pipeline operations (differences, moving average, cumulative sum, counter rate), formula operations, or for ES|QL datasets, column-based value operations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--metric_chart_config--metrics))

Optional:

- `breakdown_by` (String) Breakdown configuration as JSON. Groups metrics by a dimension. Can use operations like date histogram, terms, histogram, range, filters, or for ES|QL datasets, value operations with columns. Includes optional columns count and collapse_by configuration.
- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the chart data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--metric_chart_config--filters))
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this layer. Default is false.
- `query` (Attributes) Query configuration for filtering data. Required for non-ES|QL datasets. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--metric_chart_config--query))
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--panels--metric_chart_config--metrics"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.metric_chart_config.metrics`

Required:

- `config` (String) Metric configuration as JSON. For primary metrics: includes type ('primary'), operation, format, alignments, icon, and optional fields like sub_label, fit, color, apply_color_to, and background_chart. For secondary metrics: includes type ('secondary'), operation, format, and optional fields like label, prefix, compare, and color.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--metric_chart_config--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.metric_chart_config.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--metric_chart_config--query"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.metric_chart_config.query`

Required:

- `query` (String) Filter query string.

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language (default: 'kuery').



<a id="nestedatt--panels--tagcloud_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.tagcloud_config`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For standard layers, this specifies the data view and query.
- `metric` (String) Metric configuration as JSON. Can be a field metric operation (count, unique count, min, max, avg, median, std dev, sum, last value, percentile, percentile ranks), a pipeline operation (differences, moving average, cumulative sum, counter rate), or a formula operation.
- `query` (Attributes) Query configuration for filtering data. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--tagcloud_config--query))
- `tag_by` (String) Tag grouping configuration as JSON. Can be a date histogram, terms, histogram, range, or filters operation. This determines how tags are grouped and displayed.

Optional:

- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the chart data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--tagcloud_config--filters))
- `font_size` (Attributes) Minimum and maximum font size for the tags. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--tagcloud_config--font_size))
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this layer. Default is false.
- `orientation` (String) Orientation of the tagcloud. Valid values: 'horizontal', 'vertical', 'angled'.
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--panels--tagcloud_config--query"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.tagcloud_config.query`

Required:

- `query` (String) Filter query string.

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language (default: 'kuery').


<a id="nestedatt--panels--tagcloud_config--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.tagcloud_config.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--tagcloud_config--font_size"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.tagcloud_config.font_size`

Optional:

- `max` (Number) Maximum font size (default: 72, maximum: 120).
- `min` (Number) Minimum font size (default: 18, minimum: 1).



<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config`

Required:

- `axis` (Attributes) Axis configuration for X, left Y, and right Y axes. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis))
- `decorations` (Attributes) Visual enhancements and styling options for the chart. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--decorations))
- `fitting` (Attributes) Missing data interpolation configuration. Only valid fitting types are applied per chart type. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--fitting))
- `layers` (Attributes List) Chart layers configuration. Minimum 1 layer required. Each layer can be a data layer or reference line layer. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers))
- `legend` (Attributes) Legend configuration for the XY chart. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--legend))
- `query` (Attributes) Query configuration for filtering data. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--query))

Optional:

- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the chart data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--filters))
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.axis`

Optional:

- `left` (Attributes) Left Y-axis configuration with scale and bounds. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--left))
- `right` (Attributes) Right Y-axis configuration with scale and bounds. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--right))
- `x` (Attributes) X-axis (horizontal) configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--x))

<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--left"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.axis.left`

Optional:

- `extent` (String) Y-axis extent configuration as JSON. Can be 'full' or 'focus' mode, or 'custom' mode with start and end values.
- `grid` (Boolean) Whether to show grid lines for this axis.
- `label_orientation` (String) Orientation of the axis labels.
- `scale` (String) Y-axis scale type for data transformation.
- `ticks` (Boolean) Whether to show tick marks on the axis.
- `title` (Attributes) Axis title configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--left--title))

<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--left--title"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.axis.left.title`

Optional:

- `value` (String) Axis title text.
- `visible` (Boolean) Whether to show the title.



<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--right"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.axis.right`

Optional:

- `extent` (String) Y-axis extent configuration as JSON. Can be 'full' or 'focus' mode, or 'custom' mode with start and end values.
- `grid` (Boolean) Whether to show grid lines for this axis.
- `label_orientation` (String) Orientation of the axis labels.
- `scale` (String) Y-axis scale type for data transformation.
- `ticks` (Boolean) Whether to show tick marks on the axis.
- `title` (Attributes) Axis title configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--right--title))

<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--right--title"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.axis.right.title`

Optional:

- `value` (String) Axis title text.
- `visible` (Boolean) Whether to show the title.



<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--x"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.axis.x`

Optional:

- `extent` (String) Axis extent configuration as JSON. Can be 'full' mode with optional integer_rounding, or 'custom' mode with start, end, and optional integer_rounding.
- `grid` (Boolean) Whether to show grid lines for this axis.
- `label_orientation` (String) Orientation of the axis labels.
- `ticks` (Boolean) Whether to show tick marks on the axis.
- `title` (Attributes) Axis title configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--x--title))

<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--x--title"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.axis.x.title`

Optional:

- `value` (String) Axis title text.
- `visible` (Boolean) Whether to show the title.




<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--decorations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.decorations`

Optional:

- `fill_opacity` (Number) Area chart fill opacity (0-1 typical, max 2 for legacy).
- `line_interpolation` (String) Line interpolation method.
- `minimum_bar_height` (Number) Minimum bar height in pixels.
- `point_visibility` (String) Show data points on lines. Valid values are: auto, always, never.
- `show_current_time_marker` (Boolean) Show current time marker line.
- `show_end_zones` (Boolean) Show end zones for partial buckets.
- `show_value_labels` (Boolean) Display value labels on data points.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--fitting"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.fitting`

Required:

- `type` (String) Fitting function type for missing data.

Optional:

- `dotted` (Boolean) Show fitted values as dotted lines.
- `end_value` (String) How to handle the end value for fitting.


<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.layers`

Required:

- `type` (String) The type of layer. Valid values: 'area', 'line', 'bar', 'horizontal_bar', 'referenceLines' for NoESQL layers; 'area_chart', 'line_chart', 'bar_chart', 'horizontal_bar_chart', 'referenceLines' for ESQL layers.

Optional:

- `data_layer` (Attributes) Configuration for data layers (area, line, bar charts). Mutually exclusive with `reference_line_layer`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--data_layer))
- `reference_line_layer` (Attributes) Configuration for reference line layers. Mutually exclusive with `data_layer`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--reference_line_layer))

<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--data_layer"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.layers.data_layer`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For ES|QL layers, this specifies the ES|QL query. For standard layers, this specifies the data view and query.
- `y` (Attributes List) Array of Y-axis metrics. Each entry defines a metric to display on the Y-axis. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--data_layer--y))

Optional:

- `breakdown_by` (String) Split series configuration as JSON. For ES|QL: column and operation. For standard: field, operation, and optional parameters.
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this layer. Default is false.
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `x` (String) X-axis configuration as JSON. For ES|QL: column and operation. For standard: field, operation, and optional parameters.

<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--data_layer--y"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.layers.data_layer.y`

Required:

- `config` (String) Y-axis metric configuration as JSON. For ES|QL: axis, color, column, and operation. For standard: axis, color, and metric definition.



<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--reference_line_layer"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.layers.reference_line_layer`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For ES|QL layers, this specifies the ES|QL query. For standard layers, this specifies the data view and query.
- `thresholds` (Attributes List) Array of reference line thresholds. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--reference_line_layer--thresholds))

Optional:

- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this layer. Default is false.
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.

<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--reference_line_layer--thresholds"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.layers.reference_line_layer.thresholds`

Optional:

- `axis` (String) Which axis the reference line applies to. Valid values: 'left', 'right'.
- `color` (String) Color for the reference line. Can be a static color string or dynamic color configuration as JSON.
- `column` (String) Column to use (for ES|QL layers).
- `fill` (String) Fill direction for reference line. Valid values: 'none', 'above', 'below'.
- `icon` (String) Icon to display on the reference line. Valid values: 'asterisk', 'bell', 'bolt', 'bug', 'circle', 'dot', 'empty', 'flag', 'heart', 'partial', 'square', 'star', 'tag', 'triangle'.
- `operation` (String) Operation to apply (for ES|QL: aggregation function; for standard: metric calculation type).
- `stroke_dash` (String) Line style. Valid values: 'solid', 'dashed', 'dotted'.
- `stroke_width` (Number) Line width in pixels.
- `text` (String) Text display option for the reference line. Valid values include: 'auto', 'name', 'none', 'label'.
- `value` (String) Metric configuration as JSON (for standard layers). Defines the calculation for the threshold value.




<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--legend"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.legend`

Optional:

- `alignment` (String) Legend alignment when positioned inside the chart. Valid when 'inside' is true.
- `columns` (Number) Number of legend columns when positioned inside the chart (1-5). Valid when 'inside' is true.
- `inside` (Boolean) Position legend inside the chart. When true, use 'columns' and 'alignment'. When false or omitted, use 'position' and 'size'.
- `position` (String) Legend position when positioned outside the chart. Valid when 'inside' is false or omitted.
- `size` (String) Legend size when positioned outside the chart. Valid when 'inside' is false or omitted.
- `statistics` (List of String) Statistics to display in legend (maximum 17).
- `truncate_after_lines` (Number) Maximum lines before truncating legend items (1-10).
- `visibility` (String) Legend visibility (auto, visible, hidden).


<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--query"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.query`

Required:

- `query` (String) Filter query string.

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language (default: 'kuery').


<a id="nestedatt--panels--xy_chart_config--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `panels.xy_chart_config.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.




<a id="nestedatt--sections"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections`

Required:

- `grid` (Attributes) The grid coordinates of the section. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--grid))
- `title` (String) The title of the section.

Optional:

- `collapsed` (Boolean) The collapsed state of the section.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the section.
- `panels` (Attributes List) The panels to display in the section. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--grid"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.grid`

Required:

- `y` (Number) The Y coordinate.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels`

Required:

- `grid` (Attributes) The grid coordinates and dimensions of the panel. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--grid))
- `type` (String) The type of the panel (e.g. 'DASHBOARD_MARKDOWN', 'lens').

Optional:

- `config_json` (String) The configuration of the panel as a JSON string. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `xy_chart_config`, `metric_chart_config`, `datatable_config`, and `tagcloud_config`.
- `datatable_config` (Attributes) Configuration for a datatable chart panel. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `xy_chart_config`, `tagcloud_config`, and `config_json`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config))
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the panel.
- `markdown_config` (Attributes) The configuration of a markdown panel. Mutually exclusive with `config_json`, `xy_chart_config`, `datatable_config`, `metric_chart_config`, and `tagcloud_config`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--markdown_config))
- `metric_chart_config` (Attributes) Configuration for a metric chart panel. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `xy_chart_config`, `tagcloud_config`, `datatable_config`, and `config_json`. Metric charts display key performance indicators. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--metric_chart_config))
- `tagcloud_config` (Attributes) Configuration for a tagcloud chart panel. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `xy_chart_config`, `metric_chart_config`, `datatable_config`, and `config_json`. Tag clouds visualize word frequency. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--tagcloud_config))
- `xy_chart_config` (Attributes) Configuration for an XY chart panel. Mutually exclusive with `markdown_config`, `datatable_config`, `tagcloud_config`, and `config_json`. Use this for line, area, and bar charts. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--grid"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.grid`

Required:

- `x` (Number) The X coordinate.
- `y` (Number) The Y coordinate.

Optional:

- `h` (Number) The height.
- `w` (Number) The width.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config`

Optional:

- `esql` (Attributes) Datatable configuration for ES|QL queries. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql))
- `no_esql` (Attributes) Datatable configuration for standard (non-ES|QL) queries. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For ES|QL, this specifies the ES|QL query.
- `density` (Attributes) Density configuration for the datatable. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--density))
- `metrics` (Attributes List) Array of metric configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a datatable metric column. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--metrics))

Optional:

- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the datatable data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--filters))
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this datatable.
- `paging` (Number) Enables pagination and sets the number of rows to display per page.
- `rows` (Attributes List) Array of row configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a row split operation. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--rows))
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `sort_by` (String) Sort configuration as JSON. Only one column can be sorted at a time.
- `split_metrics_by` (Attributes List) Array of split-metrics configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a split operation for metric columns. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--split_metrics_by))
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--density"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql.density`

Optional:

- `height` (Attributes) Header and value height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height))
- `mode` (String) Density mode. Valid values: 'compact', 'default', 'expanded'.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql.density.height`

Optional:

- `header` (Attributes) Header height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height--header))
- `value` (Attributes) Value height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height--value))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height--header"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql.density.height.header`

Optional:

- `max_lines` (Number) Maximum number of lines to use before header is truncated (for custom header height).
- `type` (String) Header height type. Valid values: 'auto', 'custom'.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--density--height--value"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql.density.height.value`

Optional:

- `lines` (Number) Number of lines to display per table body cell (for custom value height).
- `type` (String) Value height type. Valid values: 'auto', 'custom'.




<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--metrics"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql.metrics`

Required:

- `config` (String) Metric configuration as JSON.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--rows"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql.rows`

Required:

- `config` (String) Row configuration as JSON.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--esql--split_metrics_by"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.esql.split_metrics_by`

Required:

- `config` (String) Split metrics configuration as JSON.



<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For standard datatables, this specifies the data view and query.
- `density` (Attributes) Density configuration for the datatable. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--density))
- `metrics` (Attributes List) Array of metric configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a datatable metric column. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--metrics))
- `query` (Attributes) Query configuration for filtering data. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--query))

Optional:

- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the datatable data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--filters))
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this datatable.
- `paging` (Number) Enables pagination and sets the number of rows to display per page.
- `rows` (Attributes List) Array of row configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a row split operation. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--rows))
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `sort_by` (String) Sort configuration as JSON. Only one column can be sorted at a time.
- `split_metrics_by` (Attributes List) Array of split-metrics configurations as JSON. Each entry defines a split operation for metric columns. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--split_metrics_by))
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--density"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.density`

Optional:

- `height` (Attributes) Header and value height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--density--height))
- `mode` (String) Density mode. Valid values: 'compact', 'default', 'expanded'.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--density--height"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.density.height`

Optional:

- `header` (Attributes) Header height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--density--height--header))
- `value` (Attributes) Value height configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--density--height--value))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--density--height--header"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.density.height.header`

Optional:

- `max_lines` (Number) Maximum number of lines to use before header is truncated (for custom header height).
- `type` (String) Header height type. Valid values: 'auto', 'custom'.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--density--height--value"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.density.height.value`

Optional:

- `lines` (Number) Number of lines to display per table body cell (for custom value height).
- `type` (String) Value height type. Valid values: 'auto', 'custom'.




<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--metrics"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.metrics`

Required:

- `config` (String) Metric configuration as JSON.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--query"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.query`

Required:

- `query` (String) Filter query string.

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language (default: 'kuery').


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--rows"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.rows`

Required:

- `config` (String) Row configuration as JSON.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--datatable_config--no_esql--split_metrics_by"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.datatable_config.no_esql.split_metrics_by`

Required:

- `config` (String) Split metrics configuration as JSON.




<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--markdown_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.markdown_config`

Optional:

- `content` (String) The content of the panel.
- `description` (String) The description of the panel.
- `hide_title` (Boolean) Hide the title of the panel.
- `title` (String) The title of the panel.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--metric_chart_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.metric_chart_config`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. Can be a data view dataset (`type: 'dataview'`), index dataset (`type: 'index'`), ES|QL dataset (`type: 'esql'`), or table ES|QL dataset (`type: 'tableESQLDatasetType'`).
- `metrics` (Attributes List) Array of metrics to display (1-2 items). Each metric can be a primary metric (displays prominently) or secondary metric (displays as comparison). Metrics can use field operations (count, unique count, min, max, avg, median, std dev, sum, last value, percentile, percentile ranks), pipeline operations (differences, moving average, cumulative sum, counter rate), formula operations, or for ES|QL datasets, column-based value operations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--metric_chart_config--metrics))

Optional:

- `breakdown_by` (String) Breakdown configuration as JSON. Groups metrics by a dimension. Can use operations like date histogram, terms, histogram, range, filters, or for ES|QL datasets, value operations with columns. Includes optional columns count and collapse_by configuration.
- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the chart data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--metric_chart_config--filters))
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this layer. Default is false.
- `query` (Attributes) Query configuration for filtering data. Required for non-ES|QL datasets. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--metric_chart_config--query))
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--metric_chart_config--metrics"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.metric_chart_config.metrics`

Required:

- `config` (String) Metric configuration as JSON. For primary metrics: includes type ('primary'), operation, format, alignments, icon, and optional fields like sub_label, fit, color, apply_color_to, and background_chart. For secondary metrics: includes type ('secondary'), operation, format, and optional fields like label, prefix, compare, and color.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--metric_chart_config--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.metric_chart_config.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--metric_chart_config--query"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.metric_chart_config.query`

Required:

- `query` (String) Filter query string.

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language (default: 'kuery').



<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--tagcloud_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.tagcloud_config`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For standard layers, this specifies the data view and query.
- `metric` (String) Metric configuration as JSON. Can be a field metric operation (count, unique count, min, max, avg, median, std dev, sum, last value, percentile, percentile ranks), a pipeline operation (differences, moving average, cumulative sum, counter rate), or a formula operation.
- `query` (Attributes) Query configuration for filtering data. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--tagcloud_config--query))
- `tag_by` (String) Tag grouping configuration as JSON. Can be a date histogram, terms, histogram, range, or filters operation. This determines how tags are grouped and displayed.

Optional:

- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the chart data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--tagcloud_config--filters))
- `font_size` (Attributes) Minimum and maximum font size for the tags. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--tagcloud_config--font_size))
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this layer. Default is false.
- `orientation` (String) Orientation of the tagcloud. Valid values: 'horizontal', 'vertical', 'angled'.
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--tagcloud_config--query"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.tagcloud_config.query`

Required:

- `query` (String) Filter query string.

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language (default: 'kuery').


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--tagcloud_config--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.tagcloud_config.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--tagcloud_config--font_size"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.tagcloud_config.font_size`

Optional:

- `max` (Number) Maximum font size (default: 72, maximum: 120).
- `min` (Number) Minimum font size (default: 18, minimum: 1).



<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config`

Required:

- `axis` (Attributes) Axis configuration for X, left Y, and right Y axes. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis))
- `decorations` (Attributes) Visual enhancements and styling options for the chart. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--decorations))
- `fitting` (Attributes) Missing data interpolation configuration. Only valid fitting types are applied per chart type. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--fitting))
- `layers` (Attributes List) Chart layers configuration. Minimum 1 layer required. Each layer can be a data layer or reference line layer. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers))
- `legend` (Attributes) Legend configuration for the XY chart. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--legend))
- `query` (Attributes) Query configuration for filtering data. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--query))

Optional:

- `description` (String) The description of the chart.
- `filters` (Attributes List) Additional filters to apply to the chart data (maximum 100). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--filters))
- `title` (String) The title of the chart displayed in the panel.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.axis`

Optional:

- `left` (Attributes) Left Y-axis configuration with scale and bounds. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--left))
- `right` (Attributes) Right Y-axis configuration with scale and bounds. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--right))
- `x` (Attributes) X-axis (horizontal) configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--x))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--left"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.axis.left`

Optional:

- `extent` (String) Y-axis extent configuration as JSON. Can be 'full' or 'focus' mode, or 'custom' mode with start and end values.
- `grid` (Boolean) Whether to show grid lines for this axis.
- `label_orientation` (String) Orientation of the axis labels.
- `scale` (String) Y-axis scale type for data transformation.
- `ticks` (Boolean) Whether to show tick marks on the axis.
- `title` (Attributes) Axis title configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--left--title))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--left--title"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.axis.left.title`

Optional:

- `value` (String) Axis title text.
- `visible` (Boolean) Whether to show the title.



<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--right"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.axis.right`

Optional:

- `extent` (String) Y-axis extent configuration as JSON. Can be 'full' or 'focus' mode, or 'custom' mode with start and end values.
- `grid` (Boolean) Whether to show grid lines for this axis.
- `label_orientation` (String) Orientation of the axis labels.
- `scale` (String) Y-axis scale type for data transformation.
- `ticks` (Boolean) Whether to show tick marks on the axis.
- `title` (Attributes) Axis title configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--right--title))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--right--title"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.axis.right.title`

Optional:

- `value` (String) Axis title text.
- `visible` (Boolean) Whether to show the title.



<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--x"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.axis.x`

Optional:

- `extent` (String) Axis extent configuration as JSON. Can be 'full' mode with optional integer_rounding, or 'custom' mode with start, end, and optional integer_rounding.
- `grid` (Boolean) Whether to show grid lines for this axis.
- `label_orientation` (String) Orientation of the axis labels.
- `ticks` (Boolean) Whether to show tick marks on the axis.
- `title` (Attributes) Axis title configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--x--title))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--axis--x--title"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.axis.x.title`

Optional:

- `value` (String) Axis title text.
- `visible` (Boolean) Whether to show the title.




<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--decorations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.decorations`

Optional:

- `fill_opacity` (Number) Area chart fill opacity (0-1 typical, max 2 for legacy).
- `line_interpolation` (String) Line interpolation method.
- `minimum_bar_height` (Number) Minimum bar height in pixels.
- `point_visibility` (String) Show data points on lines. Valid values are: auto, always, never.
- `show_current_time_marker` (Boolean) Show current time marker line.
- `show_end_zones` (Boolean) Show end zones for partial buckets.
- `show_value_labels` (Boolean) Display value labels on data points.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--fitting"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.fitting`

Required:

- `type` (String) Fitting function type for missing data.

Optional:

- `dotted` (Boolean) Show fitted values as dotted lines.
- `end_value` (String) How to handle the end value for fitting.


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.layers`

Required:

- `type` (String) The type of layer. Valid values: 'area', 'line', 'bar', 'horizontal_bar', 'referenceLines' for NoESQL layers; 'area_chart', 'line_chart', 'bar_chart', 'horizontal_bar_chart', 'referenceLines' for ESQL layers.

Optional:

- `data_layer` (Attributes) Configuration for data layers (area, line, bar charts). Mutually exclusive with `reference_line_layer`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--data_layer))
- `reference_line_layer` (Attributes) Configuration for reference line layers. Mutually exclusive with `data_layer`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--reference_line_layer))

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--data_layer"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.layers.data_layer`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For ES|QL layers, this specifies the ES|QL query. For standard layers, this specifies the data view and query.
- `y` (Attributes List) Array of Y-axis metrics. Each entry defines a metric to display on the Y-axis. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--data_layer--y))

Optional:

- `breakdown_by` (String) Split series configuration as JSON. For ES|QL: column and operation. For standard: field, operation, and optional parameters.
- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this layer. Default is false.
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.
- `x` (String) X-axis configuration as JSON. For ES|QL: column and operation. For standard: field, operation, and optional parameters.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--data_layer--y"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.layers.data_layer.y`

Required:

- `config` (String) Y-axis metric configuration as JSON. For ES|QL: axis, color, column, and operation. For standard: axis, color, and metric definition.



<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--reference_line_layer"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.layers.reference_line_layer`

Required:

- `dataset` (String) Dataset configuration as JSON. For ES|QL layers, this specifies the ES|QL query. For standard layers, this specifies the data view and query.
- `thresholds` (Attributes List) Array of reference line thresholds. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--reference_line_layer--thresholds))

Optional:

- `ignore_global_filters` (Boolean) If true, ignore global filters when fetching data for this layer. Default is false.
- `sampling` (Number) Sampling factor between 0 (no sampling) and 1 (full sampling). Default is 1.

<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--layers--reference_line_layer--thresholds"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.layers.reference_line_layer.thresholds`

Optional:

- `axis` (String) Which axis the reference line applies to. Valid values: 'left', 'right'.
- `color` (String) Color for the reference line. Can be a static color string or dynamic color configuration as JSON.
- `column` (String) Column to use (for ES|QL layers).
- `fill` (String) Fill direction for reference line. Valid values: 'none', 'above', 'below'.
- `icon` (String) Icon to display on the reference line. Valid values: 'asterisk', 'bell', 'bolt', 'bug', 'circle', 'dot', 'empty', 'flag', 'heart', 'partial', 'square', 'star', 'tag', 'triangle'.
- `operation` (String) Operation to apply (for ES|QL: aggregation function; for standard: metric calculation type).
- `stroke_dash` (String) Line style. Valid values: 'solid', 'dashed', 'dotted'.
- `stroke_width` (Number) Line width in pixels.
- `text` (String) Text display option for the reference line. Valid values include: 'auto', 'name', 'none', 'label'.
- `value` (String) Metric configuration as JSON (for standard layers). Defines the calculation for the threshold value.




<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--legend"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.legend`

Optional:

- `alignment` (String) Legend alignment when positioned inside the chart. Valid when 'inside' is true.
- `columns` (Number) Number of legend columns when positioned inside the chart (1-5). Valid when 'inside' is true.
- `inside` (Boolean) Position legend inside the chart. When true, use 'columns' and 'alignment'. When false or omitted, use 'position' and 'size'.
- `position` (String) Legend position when positioned outside the chart. Valid when 'inside' is false or omitted.
- `size` (String) Legend size when positioned outside the chart. Valid when 'inside' is false or omitted.
- `statistics` (List of String) Statistics to display in legend (maximum 17).
- `truncate_after_lines` (Number) Maximum lines before truncating legend items (1-10).
- `visibility` (String) Legend visibility (auto, visible, hidden).


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--query"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.query`

Required:

- `query` (String) Filter query string.

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language (default: 'kuery').


<a id="nestedatt--sections--panels--xy_chart_config--filters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `sections.panels.xy_chart_config.filters`

Optional:

- `language` (String) Query language. Defaults to `kuery` if not specified.
- `meta` (String) Filter metadata as JSON.
- `query` (String) Filter query string or JSON object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
# Dashboard can be imported using the composite ID format: <space_id>/<dashboard_id>
# For example, to import a dashboard with ID "my-dashboard-id" from the default space:
terraform import elasticstack_kibana_dashboard.my_dashboard default/my-dashboard-id
```
